overview:
Successfully combining two exceptional careers as a scientist and an entrepreneur, Dr. Adina Makover has many years of experience in the fields of biotech and devices. Her expertise include drugs, diagnostics and tissue engineering, dealing with technology and business aspects, as well as several years of experience in venture capital investments in the life sciences field.

Dr. Makover holds a PhD in life sciencesfrom Columbia University and the Weizmann Institute of Science) and MBA from Bar- Ilan University. As a post- doctoral fellow at the Weizmann Institute, Dept. of Cell Biology, her research focused on the molecular and genetic aspects of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy.
